text: Masakazu Suzuki (born 1 January 1955) is a former Japanese football player. ==Managerial statistics== J.League Data Site Team From To Record G W D L Win % Júbilo Iwata 2000 2002 Júbilo Iwata 2004 2004 Albirex Niigata 2018 2018 Total ==Honours== ===Manager=== ;Júbilo Iwata *J1 League: 2002 ;Individual *J.League Manager of the Year: 2001, 2002 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Yamanashi Prefecture
title: Masakazu Suzuki
